thread.title: BRIEF-Vectren Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.74

title: BRIEF-Vectren Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.74
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Vectren Corp:
* ORATION 2017 RESULTS HIT TARGET; 2018 EARNINGS GUIDANCE INITIATED; LONG-TERM GROWTH TARGETS AFFIRMED
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.74 * QTRLY TOTAL OPERATING REVENUES $711.0 MILLION VERSUS $699.0 MILLION
* SEES 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.80 TO $2.90 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.76 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.85 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* ‚Äç LONG-TERM FINANCIAL TARGETS REMAIN AS CONSOLIDATED EPS GROWTH OF 6-8 PERCENT, DIVIDEND GROWTH OF 6-8 PERCENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
